    #include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
        int T;
        cin>>T;
        for(;T;--T)
        {
            int N , x , val = 0 ;
            cin>>N;
            for(int i=1;i<=N;++i){
                cin>>x;
                val+=(x-(x%i))/i%2;
            }
            val=val%2;
            if(!val)cout<<"BOB\n";
            else cout<<"ALICE\n";
        }
        return 0;
    }
